title: League client update alpha sign-ups now open

replies.body: do we actually get to start testing? cause I signed up for this as soon as i saw it on the client and i haven't gotten a notification let alone an email... is the alpha full already?{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

Hi Fed in Vayne,

Thanks for signing up!  The alpha hasn't started yet, but should be up and running in the next few weeks.  We'll keep you posted!

Cheers
Mindstar

Hey mindstar, know this probably isn't the right place, but are you able to inform _someone_ that we should be getting updates in the Alpha Client Discussion boards whenever there is an update (or someone that should read our ACD boards, because we have been asking when updates are coming?)
Nothing happens when i click the join alpha button.
When will the alpha client be launched?
Would the client work on Mac? Or is it Windows only?
